Product.Name: Sharkskin Twill Producer Suit Pant
Product.Description:
Get the Mad Men look with a smooth and swanky sharkskin twill in a modern fit. Pair with matching vest and suit jacket for a complete suit.
  • Modern fit, sits below waist, straight leg
  • Hidden hook closure with zip fly
  • Slant hand pockets, back buttoned pockets
  • 70% Wool/22% Polyester/8% Nylon
  • Dry clean only
  • Imported

Product.Name: End On End Cotton Producer Pant
Product.Description:
The ultimate choice for a dressed-up pant that's cotton comfortable. With its trim modern fit, this pant earns its place as a versatile wardrobe favorite.
  • Modern fit, sits below waist, straight leg
  • Deep slant pockets, buttoned back welt pockets
  • Zip fly with hidden hook and eye close
  • 100% Cotton
  • Dry clean
  • Imported

Product.Description:

  • Hidden hook and button closure with zip fly
  • Deep slant pockets, back slit pockets with buttons
  • 97% Cotton/3% Spandex
  • Dry clean only
  • Imported

  • Hidden hook and button closure with zip fly
  • Deep slant pockets, back slit pockets with buttons
  • 98% Cotton/2% Spandex
